channel.title: Muzarabani on BalleWale Cricket News

item.title: Muzarabani and Ngarava Lead Zimbabwe to Victory Over Oman
item.description: Zimbabwe's Muzarabani and Ngarava shine in a commanding win against Oman, showcasing their bowling prowess in the international cricket arena.

item.title: Muzarabani Returns as Zimbabwe Opt to Bowl Against Oman in World Cup Qualifier
item.description: Zimbabwe's Tendai Muzarabani makes a comeback as they choose to bowl first against Oman in the World Cup Qualifier match.
